package_required_desc: To access this page you have to install the required packages listed below

ftp.ftp_is_disabled_desc: Click on the button below to enable it
ftp.user_not_found_desc: Click on the button below to create new one

virtualhost.virtualhost_enabled_Failed: The virtual host has not been enabled well

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.empty_piechart_label: No data to create the graph

docs.path-and-virtual-host-rules: If you want to create an URL path rule, the name field must start with a '/'. If you need to create a virtual host name rule, then the name field must match a virtual host name

validation.valid_fqdn: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.valid_fqdn_already_used: This FQDN is already used in another virtualhost
validation.key_already_exists: A virtual host with the same name already exists
validation.valid_notEmpty: This field can not be empty
validation.hostname_key_exists: The Virtual host names (FQDN) is already used
validation.valid_hostname_fqdn_1_922337203685477580: Must be a valid FQDN like 'server.domain.org', one item per line
validation.ValidFromCIDR_validator: Must be a valid CIDR like '10.10.10.0/16', one item per line
validation.Invalid_Target: Must be a valid URL like 'http://domain.com'
validation.user_already_exists: An account with the same name already exists
validation.valid_username: First character must be a letter, than only lower letters, numbers and symbols like '-' and '_'

proxypass.CIDR_Comma_Sperated_List: Empty or a CIDR comma separated list

proxypass.NoDataToDisplay: The reverse proxy feature is useful when you want to access internal sites from the outside network.

proxypass.automatic_HostRecord_creation: The server alias name of each virtual hosts will be automatically created
